name: sec-10-k-scraper
description: ## Project Structure This repository is divided into two main directories: `backend` and `ui`. ### Backend This is the `poetry` project containing the Python backend to the app.

scripts.postinstall: npm run postinstall:backend && npm run postinstall:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && poetry run pypyr pypyr/quality-check && poetry run pypyr pypyr/build-backend
